chapter.title: Column Headings
chapter.p: View the size of stories across different story statuses in a release or per iteration, by using aggregations in grid 'column aggregate'.

steps.item: Group stories by its status in grid view
Make sure all stories have a value for a 'Planning estimate'
Select 'Sum' operator and the property 'Planning Estimate' for Column Aggregate drop down
Each column header displays the sum total of the Planning Estimates for each story status.
